timeline.message:
Add OfflineAreaViewer UI

This change adds an offlinearea viewer--when users select an offline area from their list of areas, the viewer will present the bounds of the area, report the amount of space in MB the area occupies on the user's device and gives the user an option to remove the area from her device.

Navigate to the OfflineAreaViewer on Area item click

This commit updates the navigator and OfflineAreasFragment to navigate users to a viewer fragment for a selected offline area.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/google/ground-android into offline-area-viewer

Fix offline area storage calculation

We need to append tile paths with the context's file dir (where they are stored) otherwise the length call returns 0.
Fix area storage size calc; truncate down to a single decimal place

timeline.message: Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/google/ground-android into offline-area-viewer
Add a helper method for calculating area total storage size

Use a weak reference to avoid leaking Context

The OfflineAreaViewerViewModel relies on a context to get the
application's filesdir--however, since a context is associated with a
view, using it directly can result in a memory leak. A weak reference
prevents this.
Use a string resource for the OfflineAreaViewerFragment label
Add javadoc for OfflineAreaViewer classes and methods
